Package me.playernguyen.opteco.account

Interface IAccountManager

All Known Subinterfaces:
IOptEcoAccountDatabase
All Known Implementing Classes:
MySQLAccountDatabase, SQLAccountDatabase, SQLiteAccountDatabase
public interface IAccountManager

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addBalance​(java.util.UUID uuid, double amount)
    Add the point into player balance
    Account getAccount​(java.util.UUID player)
    Get account via uuid.
    Account getAccountIdentify​(java.util.UUID uuid)
    Get the account which must be existed in database.

    Get the balance of player
    boolean hasAccount​(java.util.UUID uuid)
    Check whether the account contain or not

    Save account into storage location

  • Method Details

    • save

      boolean save​(Account account)
      Save account into storage location
      Parameters:
      account - Account to save
      Returns:
      The state of saving account

    • getAccount

      Account getAccount​(java.util.UUID player)
      Get account via uuid. Whether not found player, create one
      Parameters:
      player - UUID the uuid if storage player
      Returns:
      Account account of player

    • getAccountIdentify

      @Nullable Account getAccountIdentify​(java.util.UUID uuid)
      Get the account which must be existed in database. Whether not will return null
      Parameters:
      uuid - UUID the uuid to get
      Returns:
      the account or null value

    • hasAccount

      boolean hasAccount​(java.util.UUID uuid)
      Check whether the account contain or not
      Parameters:
      uuid - UUID the uuid which want to check
      Returns:
      true or false

    • setBalance

      boolean setBalance​(java.util.UUID uuid, double amount)
      Set balance of player. This method can be use for OfflinePlayer.getUniqueId() and Entity.getUniqueId().

      Please use takeBalance(UUID, double) to minus player balance or addBalance(UUID, double) to add player point.

      Parameters:
      uuid - UUID you want to set
      amount - Double the amount to set
      Returns:
      the state which set or not

    • getBalance

      double getBalance​(java.util.UUID uuid)
      Get the balance of player
      Parameters:
      uuid - UUID player you want to set
      Returns:
      the point amount of player

    • addBalance

      boolean addBalance​(java.util.UUID uuid, double amount)
      Add the point into player balance
      Parameters:
      uuid - who you want to add
      amount - amount
      Returns:
      the state of added or not

    • takeBalance

      boolean takeBalance​(java.util.UUID uuid, double amount)
      Take the point of player balance
      Parameters:
      uuid - who you want to take
      amount - amount
      Returns:
      the state of taken or not

    • topPlayer

      java.util.List<Account> topPlayer​(int limit)
      Get the top player as points
      Parameters:
      limit - the limitation of searching query
      Returns:
      the Account list which performed by search
